Text: ENTEX Cc Hi I am going to be on vacation starting tomorrow and please send the reply regarding Entex deal to Eric Boyt ext and Louis Dicarlo ext Thank you very much for your help and have a nice day Yuan Tian AssociateENA Gas Structuring
East Gulf Calc ProceduresPST Kam Here is the EastGulf Calc Procedures Thanks Yuan
I am out of the office on pst Hi I am going to be out of the office on and I can be reached at H or cellular Thank you very much Yuan Tian

request for MCV quotes as of Cc Joe As Eric discussed we need to get the MCV Contract requoted as of close of business today For reference below are the quotes you provided on NYMEX indication on the nymex for jun dec is Basis indication for the trunkline s tx jun dec is trunklinela jun dec apr oct trunkline s tx indication nov mar apr oct trunkline la indication nov mar Index Joe the indication for index on the trunkline s texas is index index for jun dec and the trunkline la index indication is index flat index jun dec Thank you very much for your help Yuan
